metas.name: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood
metas.description: Gentle animation and catchy songs teach valuable social and emotional lessons similar to Bluey, but geared toward a slightly younger audience.

metas.name: Arthur
metas.description: Arthur and his friends deal with relatable childhood issues with humor and heart. It's a classic that promotes kindness and understanding.

metas.name: Sesame Street
metas.description: A timeless educational show with diverse characters, catchy songs, and engaging segments that teach letters, numbers, and important life lessons.

metas.name: Molly of Denali
metas.description: Molly is an Alaskan Native girl who helps her community using informational texts, maps, and her own ingenuity. It's educational and culturally enriching.

metas.name: Tumble Leaf
metas.description: Beautiful stop-motion animation and a focus on science and nature make this a visually appealing and educational choice. Fig and his friends learn through discovery and play.
